item.title: Binomial Distributions
item.description: Binomial Probability distribution has the following characteristics: A fixed number of trials n. e.g., 20 coin toss , 40 students A binary outcome, a success and a failure. Probability of success is p, probability of failure is 1-p. e.g., head or tail in a coin toss , pass or fail of sttudents in an exam, positive and negative results of a test of a patient. Constant probability for each trial.
